text: So what I'm thinking could be going on, is you said you were uploading multiple images through the other server, the hubdb image column only supports 1 image per instance of the column per tire. Even if the other server shows an interface for adding multiple images.
This would explain why you're ending up with corrupt data or broken links in the image field.

actually I'm not uploading multiple images to a single column per instance...i'm uploading multiple images in multiple columns...even then 1 image per instance of the column per tire. is not rendering

I only see 1 column for images in your screenshot?

Are the images you are adding actually in the file manager, or are you using the URL function?

<@UG52C29EE> any update on this. Not trying to push you just want to know the likelihood of being able to use heading tags in the future… even if i could say not now but within X months we’ll have this option
<@U24GZQ3GF> We are considering to implement this but no timeline from our side yet.
If we do add this, we will also likely add a limit for the size of the HTML, probably around 50k.
Nopes, there are more columns for images in this hubdb table...and I'm adding images from file manager directly not the url
